title: CONFITONE® Waist Transformation Kit
description_html: The CONFITONE® Waist Transformation Kit delivers targeted heat therapy designed to support your body contouring goals. This advanced waist belt helps enhance circulation and promote a more sculpted silhouette. Perfect for daily wear under clothing, it works seamlessly with your active lifestyle—whether you're at home, at work, or on the go. Experience the confidence that comes with visible results and feel the difference premium heat therapy can make in your transformation journey. The kit includes Waist belt, Sweat-Boost Gel, and an E-Book.
seo_description: Shape your midsection with gentle compression, added warmth and movement to achieve the waistline you're looking for and feel more confident every day.

title: Confitone - Single Arm Sleeve
description_html: Confitone Single Arm Sleeve delivers targeted compression to address loose, sagging skin while managing perspiration effectively. Engineered as a standalone solution, this individual sleeve works independently or complements your existing routine. The breathable, moisture-wicking fabric keeps skin dry while providing gentle support that promotes a more toned appearance. Ideal for those seeking a practical, non-invasive approach to skin firmness and sweat control on the arms.
seo_title: Confitone - Single Arm Sleeve for Targeted Compression
seo_description: Confitone Single Arm Sleeve delivers targeted compression for loose, sagging skin. Enjoy breathability and moisture-wicking support.

title: Confitone® ThermoTone Arm Sleeve (Pair of 2)
description_html: Confitone Arm Sleeve targets loose, sagging skin on the upper arms with precision compression technology. These sleeves deliver graduated support that firms and smooths while you move through your day. The breathable, moisture-wicking fabric keeps skin comfortable during workouts or everyday wear. Designed for visible results, each pair works to enhance arm contour and reduce the appearance of baggy skin. Experience the confidence that comes with smoother, more defined arms—backed by Confitone's commitment to effective body contouring solutions.

title: The Complete Confitone® Premium Shaping Bundle
description_html:
Unlock your best results with the Confitone Complete Package, our all‑in‑one shaping and sweat‑boosting bundle designed to support your fitness journey from every angle.

This exclusive set includes:

  • 1 pair of Arm Sleeves for targeted upper‑arm compression and support

  • 1 Shaping Belt to help you feel secure and engaged through every movement

  • 1 pair of Thigh Trimmers to promote heat and focus around your legs

  • 2 Sweat Gel bottles as free gifts to complete your routine and help you get the most out of every workout

Normally, this full bundle is valued at 328, but we’re launching it at 60% off for a limited time, so you get everything for just 131.20.
seo_title: The Complete Premium Shaping Bundle | Confitone
seo_description: All-in-one Confitone set for maximum results. Contains arm sleeves, waist belt, thigh trimmers and sweat‑boost gel for compression, shaping and thermogenesis.

title: CONFITONE® Thigh Trimmers (pair of 2)
description_html: CONFITONE® Thigh Trimmers combine advanced thermotechnology with targeted compression to sculpt and define your thighs. These innovative shapewear pieces generate gentle heat that works synergistically with compression fabric to enhance circulation and promote a smoother, more contoured silhouette. Engineered with premium materials, they provide all-day comfort while delivering visible slimming results. Whether worn under clothing or as a standalone piece, CONFITONE® Thigh Trimmers offer professional-grade body contouring backed by proven compression technology.
seo_title: CONFITONE® Thigh Trimmers - Sculpt Your Silhouette
seo_description: CONFITONE® Thigh Trimmers enhance circulation and provide compression for a smoother silhouette. Experience comfort and visible slimming all day.

title: CONFITONE® Sweat-Boost Gel (120ml)
description_html: CONFITONE® Sweat-Boost Gel activates your body's natural perspiration response, helping you maximize sweat production during workouts and training sessions. This 120ml formula is engineered to enhance thermoregulation and support intense physical performance. Apply before exercise to experience increased sweat flow, improved cooling efficiency, and deeper workout engagement. Perfect for athletes, fitness enthusiasts, and anyone seeking to optimize their training intensity. Unlock your body's full potential with every application.
seo_description: Explore CONFITONE® Sweat-Boost Gel (120ml) for effective sweat enhancement. Discover your path to peak performance!

title: CONFITONE® ThermoTone Boost Heat Patches

seo_description: ThermoTone Boost Heat Patches offer targeted heat therapy for pain relief. Experience comfort and recovery with our innovative heat patches.

title: Confitone® ThermoTone Waist Belt
description_html: Engineered for targeted core support, the Confitone® ThermoTone Waist Belt combines advanced compression technology with thermal regulation to enhance your workout performance. The precision-fit design delivers consistent pressure across your midsection, promoting proper posture and stability during intense training sessions. Thermatone fabric maintains optimal temperature control, keeping you comfortable whether you're in the gym or on the go. Ideal for athletes seeking professional-grade compression wear that doesn't compromise on breathability or style.
